scripts.dev: concurrently --names "WEB,AUTH,USER,GATEWAY" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev --workspace=@flipstaq/web" "npm run start:dev --workspace=@flipstaq/auth-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=@flipstaq/user-service" "npm run start:dev --workspace=@flipstaq/api-gateway"
